name: San Francisco-Marin Food Bank
description: SF-Marin Food Bank focuses on the immediate distribution of food while simultaneously working on long-term strategies to address hunger and empower neighbors in need. SFMFB offers the following services: - Advocacy - Cal Fresh Outreach - College Food Pantries - Community Partners Service - Covid 19 Food Services - Farm To Family - Home Delivered Groceries - Mobile Food Pantry - Neighborhood Pantries
